publicwhip.spmotion: * S2M-2693.1 Mr Tom McCabe:Council Tax—As an amendment to motion (S2M-2693) in the name of Alasdair Morgan, leave out from first “council tax” to end and insert “Scottish Executive has established the independent inquiry into local government finance consistent with the Partnership Agreement of May 2003; notes that, because of the ongoing inquiry, there are no plans for a council tax revaluation in Scotland; notes that the Labour Party has submitted clear and detailed proposals to support changes to the council tax and that the Liberal Democrats have submitted clear and detailed proposals to support a local income tax, and therefore encourages all parties and others to make submissions to the inquiry.” Supported by: Tavish Scott*
